doc.title: 10 Million hits! Thanks for reading ieatishootipost!
doc.text: I/PRP found/VBD out/IN this/DT morning/NN that/IN our/JJ counter/NN has/VBZ surged/VBN past/IN 10/CD million/NN hits/NN since/IN the/DT blog/NN was/VBD started/VBD in/IN August/NNP 2006/NNP !/. Thanks/JJ to/TO everyone/VB who/WP has/VBZ logged/VBN in/IN to/TO read/VB the/DT blog/NN and/CC especially/RB to/TO those/DT who/WP have/VBZ stayed/VBN around/IN to/TO become/VBN our/JJ makan/NN kakis/NNS and/CC for/IN helping/NN to/TO organize/VB all/DT our/JJ activities/NN !/. Four/CD years/NNS on/IN and/CC there/RB are/VBP still/RB so/RB many/JJ hawker/NN stalls/NNS which/WRB have/VB yet/RB to/TO be/VB blogged/VBD !/. Singapore/NNP is/VBZ indeed/RB a/DT food/NN paradise/NN !/. Most/JJS of/IN these/DT recommendations/JJ come/VB from/IN our/PRP$ forummers/NN who/WP are/VBP busy/VB scouring/NN for/IN good/JJ places/NNS to/TO eat/VB and/CC these/DT are/VBP the/DT same/RB guys/VBZ who/WP actually/RB organize/JJ for/IN our/PRP$ makan/NN outings/NN ./. So/RB if/IN you/PRP want/VB to/TO get/VB involved/NN ,/, do/VB join/VB our/JJ forum/NN !/. We/PRP are/VBP going/VBG to/TO have/VB our/PRP$ next/JJ makan/NN session/NN on/IN 25/CD June/NN and/CC we/PRP have/VBP managed/VBN to/TO persuade/VB our/PRP$ favorite/JJ Hong/NNP Kong/NNP Masterchef/NNP Gen/NNP Shu/NNP to/TO come/VB out/IN of/IN retirement/NN to/TO cook/VB us/PRP a/DT banquet/NN ./. Details/WP will/MD be/VB published/VBN before/IN the/DT weekend/NN ./. So/RB do/VB look/VB out/VB for/IN the/DT announcement/NN !/. Due/JJ to/TO popular/JJ demand/NN ,/, we/PRP are/VBP also/RB planning/VBG another/DT Durian/NNP makan/NN session/NN soon/NN !/.
